name: Final Lap
description:
WELCOME TO FINAL LAP

• FINAL LAP is the best mobile racing game that puts players into the race seat of their heroes in a FULL SEASON.

• Experience a high quality Universal Purchase app which runs on iPhone, iPad.

• Start your carrier as a rookie driver, find a Sponsor. Challenge with the World's best drivers.

• Play the Tracks around the World. Spain, Usa, Germany, Japan, China and many more.

• Becoming a Champion is on your hands.

• FINAL LAP has stunning Graphics and Gameplay.

• Play full racing season and collect the points.

Your racing team is waiting for you DRIVER!
